subject: p19759491
Findings: Cardiac silhouette remains enlarged, and is accompanied by pulmonary vascular congestion and a mild interstitial edema. Left retrocardiac opacity has slightly improved, could reflect improving atelectasis or a resolving pneumonia in the appropriate clinical setting. Adjacent small left pleural effusion is also slightly smaller. No visible pneumothorax.
